title.full: Develope the Technical Support on Blockchain
title.responsive: Develope the Technical Support on Blockchain

about.title: INTRODUCING YESBIT
about.content: Yesbit is a Toronto-based company focusing on the Blockchain technology and cryptocurrency usage, we run an OTC trading platform called YesbitOTC, develope an KrawlCat protocol with ERC 1973, and provide the Blockchain technical support.

subtitle.full: KNOW MORE ABOUT WHAT WE DO
subtitle.responsive: KNOW MORE ABOUT WHAT WE DO

projects.otccontent: Fiat-currency can be used during the crypto trading. The 24/7 customer service is provided to protect every ueser's funds.
projects.krawlcatcontent: KrawlCat Generalized Oracles bridges the gap between the current internet infrastructure and closed blockchain networks by bringing off-chain data to on-chain. Moreover, its generalized nature allows it to facilitate cross chain communication between solitary blockchain protocols.

career.title: JOIN US
career.des: We are always looking for the talented people to join our team!
